//: Normally left blank. Used to set RTSP Server Address
RtspServerComment: ## Select RTSP Server > 0:Use RTSP Server from 'RTSPAddress:' 1:RPOS RTSP Server 2:V4L2 RTSP Server by mpromonet (auto selected if MulticastEnabled=true) 3:GStreamer RTSP Server
PTZDriverComment: ## valid values are none,tenx,pelcod,visca and pan-tilt-hat
PTZOutputComment: ## values are none (eg Tenx), serial and tcp
AuthDebugComment: ## Set to true to enable [AuthDebug] authentication logs
AuthReuseEnabledComment: ## Allow recent authentication to be reused
AuthReuseSecondsComment: ## Window (seconds) in which a prior auth remains valid
EventRetentionTimeComment: ## How long to keep events queued for pull-point clients
EventPollingTimeoutComment: ## Default timeout applied to PullMessages when clients omit it
